name: Burg_322
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Island Creole loanwords
suspicious of outsiders during reagent shortages
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and locally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents; trade-dependent
notes: population small; seasonal crews swell numbers
minor harbor on a coastal trade lane; strategic for reagent transshipment
